layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x42
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x42
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {div} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutBlockFlow {t} at (0,0) size 784x18 [color=#008000]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 291x18
            text run at (0,0) width 291: "This paragraph should be in green characters."
